description: Detects adversary creating hidden file or directory, by detecting directories or files with . as the first character Author: Pawel Mazur. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Hidden Files and Directoriese
query: ((type:"EXECVE" AND a0:("mkdir" OR "touch" OR "vim" OR "nano" OR "vi")) AND (a1:*\/.* OR a1:.* OR a2:*\/.* OR a2:.*))
